page.title: 17Children's Weekends
page.content: EUAN MACGREGOR aged 7 On Sunday I got up at 11 o'clock and Eleanor was making a mess and I couldn't get up because Eleanor had made such a mess that I couldn't even stand up in my bedroom. When Eleanor had tidied it up I got up and changed into my clothes I had my breakfast at 12 o'clock and then we went blackberrying in our garden. Then we went looking for cooking apples, when we had done that we had to get ready for Daddy to go to Bristol. I had fish for tea. ROBIN NASH aged 8 On Saturday I woke up at 6 o'clock I got dressed in my jeans and shirt and army jumper. Then I went downstairs and put on my boots,I had Frosties for breakfast then I cleaned my teeth. We went out into our field and my Dad and I cut logs with a chain saw all day.
